text:

IT CANNOT BE! ;_;

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
The artwork of his face creeps me out. For the longest time, I saw him as a buck-toothed, smiling rabbit with a pron-goatee.
And it fit.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Oh man, some Circus Peanuts sound really good right now.

name: goosey
text: I thought this was a 3, but then the callback of Philippe cuddling his money in the first frame gets it plus-one.

name: soticoto
text:
Precisely... to the letter... what I was thinking.
Plus 1 for Philippe.

name: geozimmdrake
text:
this one, also very good.
second reference to john holmes, i think
i really like 'umm i dunno, im not really in very good shape right now?' with a question mark on the end.
also 'how do you keep your parents from finding out?'
'that you're out of shape?'

name: perilon
text:
John Holmes is Roast Beef's porno name: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=09092003

He had a mouse named John
And he lived on Holmes Lane

name: prettyrad
text:
Oh damnit, why does somebody always have to have already figured these things out before me? These strange, strange... coincidences... that should not be looked into any further.
Reluctant chubby.

name: rasalghul
text:
It was actually Goldfish #1A Loomis Pines Trailer Court Sani-Hookup 12.

According to the alt-text anyway.

name: possums
text:
"You should try it, it'd be a lot of fun for you.


You would have fun."

name: tekende
text:
His insistence on this is mildly creepy. I want to start saying this to people.

"Hey, you up for going to the bar tonight? It'd be a lot of fun for you. You would have fun."

name: rumblefish
text: Each word said in a manner 15% less cheery than the last.
